films.title: Black Adam
films.synopsis: Nearly 5,000 years after he was bestowed with the almighty powers of the ancient gods - and imprisoned just as quickly - Black Adam (Johnson) is freed from his earthly tomb, ready to unleash his unique form of justice on the modern world.

films.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
films.synopsis: The nation of Wakanda is pitted against intervening world powers as they mourn the loss of their king T'Challa.

films.title: Lyle, Lyle, Crocodile
films.synopsis: Based on the best-selling book series by Bernard Waber, Lyle, Lyle, Crocodile is a live-action / CGI musical comedy that brings this beloved character to a new, global audience.
